modName: Edited Texture for Way of the Sword - Skyrim Katana Revised
summary: Its only a retexture. You will need a whole mod by  Seven7Black
descriptionHtml:
I was bored yesterday while waiting for Dawnguard release =) This is my try to retexture Seven7Black\'s amazing improvement of vanilla akaviri swords, so If you want to use It than you need this awesome mod :

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18044
author: Rainkitty
